fields.headline: Quick getaways
fields.bodyText: Under £100 Spend three nights in a traditional setting in north Devon and pay for just two. The St Vincent Hotel (01598 752244; st-vincent-hotel.co.uk) is in secluded Castle Hill, Lynton. A room is £60 a night based on two people sharing until 29 December. Under £200 For some last-minute shopping, stay two nights at the Continental in Frankfurt with OnLinetravel. com. Departing 17 December from Gatwick, this break costs £128pp, based on two sharing. Under £400 Anatolian Sky Holidays (08708 504040; anatolian-sky.co.uk) is offering a five-night stay at the four-star Acropol Hotel in Istanbul for departures between 9 and 24 December for £309pp, with flights leaving from Heathrow. Under £500 Thomson America and Canada (0870 4030653) offers four nights for the price of three in Boston. The price of £439 includes flights and room-only accommodation at the three-star Radisson Hotel. Departures until 16 December. Three nights in Havana, Cuba, cost £499pp from 11 December with Carefree World (01293 527700; carefree-world.com), including flights from Gatwick and B&B at the Hotel Sevilla. Experience Goa for 14 nights with Hayes and Jarvis (0870 8989890; hayesandjarvis.co.uk) which is offering two weeks at the Colonia Santa Maria Hotel for £499pp. The price is based on two sharing a twin room and includes breakfast and flights. Departs 11 December from Gatwick.
